WUFT-TV. UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA. 234 STADIUM. GAINESVILLE. FLORIDA
Mr. William G. Harley
N.A.E.B.
Suite 1119
13^.6 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
December llj., I960
Dear Bill:
Thank you for your very kind note. I
really didn’t expect to be re-named to the
N.A.E.B. Board. Nevertheless, I am honored
and’flattered. 1*11 certainly make every
effort to be helpful and wise.
N.A.E.B, has a most significant role
to play in broadcasting. I am pleased to
do whatever I can for the organization and
for the movement.
With warm personal regards, I am
Cordially,
Kenneth A. Christiansen
KACrhg
